Over the last few decades the North End has become the mecca of cannoli -- flaky fried shells piped with ricotta or custard filling. (Globe)

Police shoot, kill man after traffic stop

Blood storage lab holds medical clues

Deep beneath Commonwealth Ave. is a freezer farm stocked with more than 2 million frozen vials of human blood, a trove for scientists endeavoring to answer some of the most vexing questions in medicine. (Boston Globe)
